abstract.t: This document discusses the applicability RFC 2766, Network AddressTranslation - Protocol Translation (NAT-PT) employing the StatelessIP/ICMP Translation (SIIT) algorithm, as an IPv4-to-IPv6 transitionand co-existence mechanism. It highlights the NAT-PT/SIIT operationalprinciples and the network context for which NAT-PT was designed.Known limitations of NAT-PT/SIIT are presented. Applicable scenarios
